name: CNContactPicker
desc: A popover-based interface for selecting a contact.

items.name: var delegate: CNContactPickerDelegate?
items.desc: The picker delegate to be notified when the user chooses a contact.

items.name: protocol CNContactPickerDelegate
items.desc: The methods that you implement to respond to contact-picker user events.

items.name: var displayedKeys: [String]
items.desc: The keys to be displayed when a contact is expanded.

items.name: func showRelative(to: NSRect, of: NSView, preferredEdge: NSRectEdge)
items.desc: Shows the picker popover anchored to the specified view.
